title: Lenses IAM Role Schema
description: Schema for defining a Lenses IAM Role.

name.description: The unique name of the IAM role. Lowercase alphanumeric or hyphens, not starting/ending with hyphen, max 63 chars.

display_name.description: Display name for the IAM role.

policy.description: List of permission statements for this role.

metadata.description: Custom string key/values for the role.
